title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 304: Featuring Elias Pettersson
description:
On episode 304 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Vancouver Canucks superstar Elias Pettersson. EP40 joined (51:30) to talk about playing in Vancouver, watching Whit play in Sweden, his gaming and a bunch more. The guys open up the podcast talking about the World Series and the crazy call to pull Blake Snell. They then get into some hockey, talking about the Mitchell Miller situation in Arizona, Sam Reinhart, Halloween and finish with a nice tribute to the legendary Joey Moss.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
